Specs

CSS Class: .x-form-trigger-input-cell (field), .x-trigger-cell (trigger) and .x-boudlist (list)

Ext.form.field.Time

Extends from Ext.form.field.Base

  • formfield (.x-field-default or .x-form-type-text)

  • boundlist (.x-boundlist)

    • format

    • pickerMaxHeight
